lead.company_name: Society for the Study of Economic Inequality -ECINEQ-

emailContent.subject: Proposal to host Society for the Study of Economic Inequality -ECINEQ- event at Ariyana Convention Centre
emailContent.text:
Dear Flaviana Palmisano,

As a key organization in the Economics sector, we would like to invite Society for the Study of Economic Inequality -ECINEQ- to consider Danang, Vietnam for an upcoming edition.

We believe Danang offers a compelling rotation option in Asia for your future meetings.
Our convention centre can comfortably host 250+ delegates with premium meeting facilities, breakout rooms, and exhibition space.
We understand your community engages stakeholders across Rome, Italy and would love to partner with you on a future edition.

Ariyana Convention Centre Danang is the award-winning venue that proudly hosted APEC 2017. Our experienced international team is ready to support your bidding process and tailor a proposal to your requirements.

May we arrange a short call to discuss how we can support your next event in Vietnam?

Warm regards,
Sales & Marketing Team
Ariyana Convention Centre Danang
marketing@furamavietnam.com
